introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is ちく which you will often hear in contexts like geography lessons, urban planning discussions, or when someone tries to describe the layout of a city, for example, "the shopping district" or "residential area".
meaning_explanation_english: The word 区 (く) means "area" or "district". It is used to describe a particular geographic location or a division within a city or town in Japan. This can refer to neighborhoods, communities, or specific regions. When you think of a 区 (く) in Japan, imagine a part of the city that's recognized for its own unique characteristics or administrative functions.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of 区 (く) are ちたい which means "zone" or "belt," often referring to a broader stretch of land, and ちいき which is similar to "region" and is used for larger, often rural areas. 区 (く) can be more specific, often used within city contexts.
antonyms: 中心 : ちゅうしん : center
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of 区 (く) are ちゅうしん which means "center," or "central area," often referring to the heart or core part of something, and ほんぶ which means "headquarters," focusing on the main or central organizational point, contrasting with the segmented nature of 区 (く).

example_sentences.kanji: この地区には公園があります。
example_sentences.furigana: この地区(ちく)には公園(こうえん)があります。

translations.EN: There is a park in this district.
translations.ES: Hay un parque en este distrito.
translations.VI: Có một công viên ở khu vực này.
translations.FR: Il y a un parc dans ce quartier.
translations.ZH: 在这个地区有一个公园。
translations.TL: May parke sa distrito na ito.
translations.MY: ဒီရပ်ကွက်မှာ ပန်းခြံရှိတယ်။
translations.HI: इस क्षेत्र में एक पार्क है।
translations.FA: در این منطقه پارکی وجود دارد.

example_sentences.furigana: この地区(ちく)は静(しず)かです。

translations.MY: ဤဒေသမှာတိတ်ဆိတ်တယ်။

example_sentences.kanji: 新しい地区は静かです。
example_sentences.furigana: 新しい(あたらしい)地区(ちく)は静か(しずか)です。

translations.VI: Khu vực mới rất yên tĩnh.
translations.MY: နယ်မြေအသစ်မြင့်ကိုယ်ကိုစတင်ပါသည်။

example_sentences.furigana: この地区(ちく)は静(しず)かです。

translations.MY: ဤမြို့နယ်သည် တိတ်ဆိတ်ပါသည်။
